title: Does anyone know where to find more fonts of this genre ?
content:
Does anyone know where to find more fonts of this genre? I had  
one in my external hard drive but it burned out with all my stuff in it, i’m trying to remember what the name was but i can’t [it was a free download as well].

thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font-_4621.jpg)

 [‹ WTF What the Font HELP ME please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162202/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45624 "Go to previous forum topic") [Agropur sans and serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162202/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45589 "Go to next forum topic")
author: S Vector

comments.content: [Neutura](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162202/http:/www.neutura.org/) has a couple of typefaces in this genre. For example [Deuce](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162202/http:/neutura.org/Deuce.html) and [Belfast](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162202/http:/neutura.org/Belfast.html).
